points.name: ID
points.label: Model ID
points.desc: Model identifier

points.name: L
points.label: Model Length
points.desc: Model length

points.name: Nam
points.label: Controller
points.desc: Descriptive name for this control unit

points.name: Typ
points.label: Type
points.desc: Type of tracker

points.name: DtLoc
points.label: Date
points.desc: Local date in YYYYMMDD format

points.name: TmLoc
points.label: Time
points.desc: 24 hour local time stamp to second

points.name: Day
points.label: Day
points.desc: Number of the day in the year (1-366)

points.name: GlblElCtl
points.label: Manual Elevation
points.desc: Global manual override target position of elevation in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type

points.name: GlblAzCtl
points.label: Manual Azimuth
points.desc: Global manual override target position of azimuth in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type

points.name: GlblCtl
points.label: Global Mode
points.desc: Global Control register operates on all trackers. Normal operation is automatic.  Operator can override the position by setting the ElCtl, AzCtl and enabling Manual operation. Entering calibration mode will revert to automatic operation after calibration is complete.

points.name: GlblAlm
points.label: Global Alarm
points.desc: Global tracker alarm conditions

points.name: Dgr_SF
points.label: SF
points.desc: Scale Factor for targets and position measurements in degrees

points.name: N
points.label: Trackers
points.desc: Number of trackers being controlled.  Size of repeating block.

points.name: Id
points.label: Tracker
points.desc: Descriptive name for this tracker unit

points.name: ElTrgt
points.label: Target Elevation
points.desc: Auto target elevation in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type

points.name: AzTrgt
points.label: Target Azimuth
points.desc: Auto target azimuth  in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis horizontal tracker type

points.name: ElPos
points.label: Elevation
points.desc: Actual elevation position  in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type

points.name: AzPos
points.label: Azimuth
points.desc: Actual azimuth position  in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis horizontal tracker type

points.name: ElCtl
points.label: Manual Elevation
points.desc: Manual override target position of elevation in degrees from horizontal.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type

points.name: AzCtl
points.label: Manual Azimuth
points.desc: Manual override target position of azimuth in degrees from true north towards east.  Unimplemented for single axis azimuth tracker type

points.name: Ctl
points.label: Mode
points.desc: Control register. Normal operation is automatic.  Operator can override the position by setting the ElCtl, AzCtl and enabling Manual operation. Entering calibration mode will revert to automatic operation after calibration is complete.

points.name: Alm
points.label: Alarm
points.desc: Tracker alarm conditions
